p: Human embryonic kidney cells (293) and lung adenocarcinoma cells (A549) were purchased from the ATCC and maintained in Dulbecco’s modified Eagle’s medium (DMEM)/F12 (1:1) (Gibco; Thermo Fisher Scientific, Inc., Waltham, MA, USA) while Madin-Darby canine kidney cells (MDCK) were obtained from the ATCC and maintained in DMEM (Gibco; Thermo Fisher Scientific, Inc.,); all media were supplemented with 10% fetal bovine serum (FBS; Gibco; Thermo Fisher Scientific, Inc.,).
